alert.note: Alert for Lonoke; Prairie; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 3:35PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prairie, northern Lonoke and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 415 PM CST... At 334 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cammack Village, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Downtown Little Rock... Lonoke... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Argenta... Old Austin... Parnell... Gravel Ridge... Meto... Thurman... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 131 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 146 and 173. Interstate 430 between mile markers 4 and 12. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 14. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
